name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Draconic.

name: Draconic Ancestry
racial_text: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one of the following draconic ancestries from below. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the draconic ancestry choosen.

name: Black Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Acid and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 5 by 30ft. line (Dex. save).

name: Blue Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Lightning and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 5 by 30ft. line (Dex. save).

name: Brass Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Fire and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 5 by 30ft. line (Dex. save).

name: Bronze Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Lightning and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 5 by 30ft. line (Dex. save).

name: Copper Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Acid and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 5 by 30ft. line (Dex. save).

name: Gold Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Fire and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 15ft. cone (Dex. save).

name: Green Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Poison and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 15ft. cone (Con. save).

name: Red Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Fire and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 15ft. cone (Dex. save).

name: Silver Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Cold and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 15ft. cone (Con. save).

name: White Dragon Ancestor
racial_text: Your damage type is Cold and your Breath Weapon takes the form of a 15ft. cone (Con. save).

name: Breath Weapon
racial_text: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your Draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a saving throw, the type of which is determined by your Draconic ancestry. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your Proficiency Bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level. After you use your breath weapon, you can’t use it again until you complete a short or Long Rest.

name: Damage Resistance
racial_text: You have Resistance to the damage type associated with your Draconic ancestry.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Dwarvish.

name: Dwarven Combat Training
racial_text: You have proficiency with the Battleaxe, Handaxe, Light Hammer, and Warhammer.

name: Dwarven Resilience
racial_text: You have advantage on Saving Throws against poison, and you have Resistance against poison damage.

name: Armored Movement
racial_text: Your speed is not reduced by wearing Heavy Armor.

name: Tool Proficiency
racial_text: You gain proficiency with the artisan’s tools of your choice: smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.

name: Stonecunning
racial_text: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the Origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your Proficiency Bonus to the check, instead of your normal Proficiency Bonus.

name: Dwarven Toughness
racial_text: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common, Elvish and one extra of language your choice.

name: Fey Ancestry
racial_text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

name: Trance
racial_text: Elves do not sleep. Instead they meditate deeply, remaining semi-conscious, for 4 hours a day. The Common word for this meditation is trance. While meditating, you dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive after years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit a human would from 8 hours of sleep.

name: Keen Senses
racial_text: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

name: Cantrip
racial_text: You know one cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

name: Elf Weapon Training
racial_text: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Gnomish. Gnomish uses Dwarven script for writing.

name: Gnome Cunning
racial_text: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws against magic.

name: Artificer’s Lore
racial_text: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to Magic Items, alchemical Objects, or technological devices, you can add twice your Proficiency Bonus, instead of any Proficiency Bonus you normally apply.

name: Tinker
racial_text: You have proficiency with artisan’s tools (tinker’s tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to Construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours (unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep the device functioning), or when you use your action to dismantle it; at that time, you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time. When you create a device, choose one of the following options:

name: Clockwork Toy
racial_text: This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or Soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.

name: Fire Starter
racial_text: The device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a Candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

name: Music Box
racial_text: When opened, this music box plays a single song at a moderate volume. The box stops playing when it reaches the song’s end or when it is closed.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Halfling.

name: Lucky
racial_text: When you roll a 1 on The D20 for an Attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

name: Brave
racial_text: You have advantage on Saving Throws against being Frightened.

name: Halfling Nimbleness
racial_text: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

name: Naturally Stealthy
racial_text: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other Ability Scores of your choice increase by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common, Elvish and one extra of language your choice.

name: Fey Ancestry
racial_text: You have advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

name: Skill Versatility
racial_text: You gain proficiency in two Skills of your choice.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Orcish. Orcish has no script of its own but can be written in the Dwarvish script.

name: Menacing
racial_text: You gain proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

name: Relentless Endurance
racial_text: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can’t use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

name: Savage Attacks
racial_text: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon Attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: All of your Ability Scores each increase by 1.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and one extra of language your choice.

name: Ability Score Increase
racial_text: Your Intelligence score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 2.

name: Languages
racial_text: You can speak, read and write Common and Infernal.

name: Hellish Resistance
racial_text: You have Resistance to fire damage.

name: Infernal Legacy
racial_text: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. When you reach 3rd Level, you can cast the Hellish Rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest. When you reach 5th Level, you can cast the Darkness spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest. Charisma is your Spellcasting Ability for these Spells.
